doc:
Nigel Patrick https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigel_Patrick 0 Nigel Patrick (born Nigel Dennis Patrick Wemyss-Gorman; 2 May 1912 – 21 September 1981) was an English actor and stage director born into a theatrical family. During the late 1940s and 1950s, he became known as a debonair leading man in British films, though he could also portray rogues. He featured in The Sound Barrier (aka, Breaking Through the Sound Barrier, 1952), under the direction of David Lean. Nigel_Patrick ( born Nigel_Dennis_Patrick_Wemyss-Gorman ; 2_May_1912 – 21_September_1981 ) was an_English_actor_and_stage_director born into a_theatrical_family . During the_late_1940s_and_1950s , he became_known as a_debonair_leading_man in British_films , though he could_also_portray rogues . He featured in The_Sound_Barrier_(_aka , Breaking Through the_Sound_Barrier , 1952_) , under the_direction of David Lean .
